description:
(Found in Collection 2/27/96)
main body cut in one piece with tongue and ankle section added; seam from tip of toe to tongue; inverted 'T' seam at heal; leather gathered around tongue; lower part of tongue trimmed with purple yarn; upside down flower in blue, green, red, and orange seed beads on tongue; purple ribbon trim on ankle section; ankle section tied with pale green ribbon.
title: Child's Mocassins
